title: Sidewall, 1998-75-81, 1920–50
creditline: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
description: A narrow arabesque design which repeats in two columns across the width. The arabesque contains a pair of griffons, standing on a rod with lambrequin, supporting an urn with fruit. Above this is a pair of acanthus scrolls with quiver and arrow pendents. Above this is a cameo with urn on a pale blue background. Above the cameo is a pair of fowls, possibly swans. Printed in grisaille and blue on a gray ground.
